overview: From 2025-10-26 to 2025-11-02, Sendo-labs/plugin-sendo-worker had 5 new PRs (6 merged), 0 new issues, and 2 active contributors.

topPRs.title: feat: Add comprehensive test infrastructure with real runtime testing
topPRs.author: standujar
topPRs.body:
## üéØ What This Does

Builds a **bulletproof testing system** so we can ship fast without breaking things. No more "works on my machine" surprises!

## ‚ú® Key Changes

### Testing Infrastructure
- **98 automated tests** covering all critical features (63 unit + 27 integration + 8 DB)
- **Fixture-based system**: Centralized test data in `fixtures/llm-responses.ts`
- **Smart test helpers**: Automatically detect prompt types and return correct responses
- **Testing guide**: Complete [`__tests__/README.md`](src/__tests__/README.md) for contributors

### Bug Fixes & Improvements
- ‚úÖ Added `errorType` field to distinguish setup failures vs execution failures
- ‚úÖ Fixed database crash when running ACTION type actions (missing room creation)
- ‚úÖ Refactored mock system - eliminated 176 lines of duplicated code

### Before/After
```typescript
// ‚ùå Before: Copy-paste nightmare repeated in every test
runtime.useModel = mock((options) => {
  if (prompt.includes('GET_WALLET_BALANCE')) {
    return { category: 'DATA', actionType: 'wallet_info' };
  }
  // ... repeated 20+ times across files
});

// ‚úÖ After: One simple line, centralized data
setupLLMMock(runtime, { useFixtures: true });
```

## üìä Test Coverage

**Unit Tests** (63 tests across 9 files):
- Action categorization (6 tests)
- Action execution (8 tests)
- Relevant actions selection (6 tests)
- Analysis generation (5 tests)
- Recommendations generation (7 tests)
- Analysis saving (5 tests)
- Provider data collection (6 tests)
- Decision processing (12 tests)
- DB getters (8 tests)

**Integration Tests** (27 tests):
- Full analysis workflow (8 tests)
- API routes with error handling (19 tests)

**Database Tests** (8 tests)

## üèóÔ∏è Architecture

```
__tests__/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ fixtures/
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ llm-responses.ts        # Centralized test data
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ helpers/
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ test-runtime.ts         # Runtime creation utilities
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ mock-llm.ts             # Intelligent LLM mocking
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ unit/                        # 9 test files
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ integration/                 # 2 test files
```

## üöÄ How to Use

```bash
# Run all tests
bun run test:all

# Run specific suites
bun run test:unit
bun run test:integration

# Debug mode
setupLLMMock(runtime, { useFixtures: true, logPrompts: true });
```

## üìà Stats

- **+3,221 lines** of test infrastructure
- **-176 lines** of old/duplicated code
- **98 tests** passing with 0 failures

## üéØ Impact

- ‚úÖ Ship features faster with confidence
- ‚úÖ Catch bugs before they reach production
- ‚úÖ Easy for new contributors to add tests
- ‚úÖ Consistent, reproducible test results

## üí° Testing Philosophy

- **Real execution paths**: Use actual ElizaOS runtime, not excessive mocking
- **Minimal mocking**: Only mock LLM calls, everything else is real
- **Predictable data**: Fixtures ensure consistent, reproducible tests
- **Easy maintenance**: Centralized data makes updates trivial

## üéØ Next Steps

1. Enhanced seed script using fixtures for realistic demo data
2. Real LLM testing with `USE_REAL_LLM` flag
3. Integration testing with actual ElizaOS plugins (Solana, EVM)

topPRs.title: refactor: modularize SendoWorkerService into focused modules and full Wallet Integration
topPRs.author: standujar
topPRs.body:
## Summary

Refactored the monolithic SendoWorkerService (1223 lines) into a modular architecture with 9 specialized modules, reducing the main service to 257 lines (-79%).

## Key Changes

- **9 new modules** with single responsibilities (WorldManager, ProviderCollector, DataSelector, DataExecutor, ActionCategorizer, AnalysisGenerator, RecommendationGenerator, DecisionProcessor, AnalysisRepository)
- **SendoWorkerService** now acts as orchestrator, delegating to modules
- **Improved error handling** with proper error type classification (initialization/execution/technical)
- **Better testability** - unit tests now test modules directly
- **Integration tests** updated to use proper service loading mechanism

## Test Plan

- [x] All unit tests passing (9 test files)
- [x] Integration tests updated and passing
- [x] Build successful
- [x] Error handling properly categorizes error types

topPRs.title: chore: add GitHub workflows for automated NPM publishing and releases
topPRs.author: M4XGO
topPRs.body:
- Created .release-please-manifest.json to define the release version.
- Added release-please-config.json for release type and changelog configuration.
- Implemented GitHub Actions workflows for automated NPM publishing and release management.


## How : 
Using : https://github.com/Sendo-labs/reusable-workflows/pull/1 to test

topPRs.title: chore(main): release 1.0.0
topPRs.author: github-actions
topPRs.body:
:robot: I have created a release *beep* *boop*
---


## 1.0.0 (2025-10-26)


### Features

* Add comprehensive test infrastructure with real runtime testing ([fcf3f9b](https://github.com/Sendo-labs/plugin-sendo-worker/commit/fcf3f9bcae6b7bbaf658fee0a171d86839cc3414))
* add initial implementation of the Sendo Worker ([463e5ff](https://github.com/Sendo-labs/plugin-sendo-worker/commit/463e5fff9c2423438989cbf4b0cd808b08227feb))
* enhance analysis functionality by adding new API route to retrieve analysis by ID, update runAnalysis method to include recommended actions, and implement integration tests for analysis workflow ([ede9796](https://github.com/Sendo-labs/plugin-sendo-worker/commit/ede9796a5d74d681e750449ce72c2470524d15ff))


### Bug Fixes

* **tests:** cast response in categorizeActions test to any for TypeScript compatibility ([b13670b](https://github.com/Sendo-labs/plugin-sendo-worker/commit/b13670bda791ecadf75ceb5922a85abb370a17e2))

---
